DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine influence selective laser trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) ocular rigidity glaucoma patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) Ocular Rigidity
DOC.detailed_description: Ocular Rigidity ( corneal hysteresis corneal resistance factor ) measure Ocular Response Analyzer ( Reichert ) 4 week SLT ( Q-switched 532 nm frequency double neodymium yttrium aluminium garnet laser spot size 400 µm 3-ns pulse duration ) . The trabecular meshwork treat 100 spot 360° energy 0,8 mJ . The purpose examine selective laser trabeculoplasty change ocular rigidity .
DOC.criteria: glaucoma patient ( primary open angle glaucoma , ocular hypertension ) age 18 need IOP reduction control glaucoma form glaucoma ( angle closure , secondary glaucoma , congenital , juvenile ) , acute psychosis , epilepsy
DOC.keyword: glaucoma , selective laser trabeculoplasty , ocular rigidity
